attributes.action: remove NHS targets to give medical staff more flexibility in treating patients
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Wherever the Government has imposed targets, there has been a breakdown in the system It is human nature to find a way of meeting targets by the easiest way possible. In the NHS, this has been shown to be detrimental to the patient. If medical staff are allowed to do their jobs without the "Damocles Sword" of targets hanging over their heads, there would be a more caring attitude towards patients.
